title: thepeterson
author: thepeterson
content: Does anybody here offers a commission for getting him a campaign client successfully? For signatures or bounties specifically if yes feel free to comment or DM how it's gonna work.. I can on-board couple of projects

comments.author: dimonstration
comments.body: Quote from: thepeterson on July 02, 2023, 07:44:17 PMDoes anybody here offers a commission for getting him a campaign client successfully? For signatures or bounties specifically if yes feel free to comment or DM how it's gonna work.. I can on-board couple of projects@Royse777 have this kind of commission based offer to all the user that can refer him to project that can be potentially client for his signature campaign management service. I remember that he already closed the thread for this service but you can still try to contact him via telegram or post on his service ann thread https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5328445.0 about your offer.I think you can PM other campaign manager like Hhampuz,Yahoo and Icopress to negotiate for your offer because this is potential client after all so I think they might accept you offer.

comments.author: thepeterson
comments.body: Exactly I was going to DM then I thought about forum spam ban and decided to post instead.

comments.author: dimonstration
comments.body: Quote from: thepeterson on July 02, 2023, 07:54:21 PMExactly I was going to DM then I thought about forum spam ban and decided to post instead.You will only get banned if you are spamming them and not sending a single proposal that is related to their field of work. Also it's good move to create this thread so that other campaign manager will be aware to your offer because there's a lot of campaign manager that I still didn't mention that might be interested to your offer.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: I remember some thread like this asking before, but sadly there is no campaign manager as of the moment accept such as referral program as per my knowledge (i hope there is). Maybe because they are so confident of their network where their previous participants always recommends them to those company's representative/owner that are asking.

comments.author: ItsCrafty
comments.body: Quote from: thepeterson on July 02, 2023, 07:44:17 PMDoes anybody here offers a commission for getting him a campaign client successfully? For signatures or bounties specifically if yes feel free to comment or DM how it's gonna work.. I can on-board couple of projectsThanks for creating this thread as i am looking for such a person. we will further talk in telegram about this. i have managed 4 compaign before and you can reach me anytime.here is my telegram Id= @CZChina

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: thepeterson on July 02, 2023, 07:54:21 PMExactly I was going to DM then I thought about forum spam ban and decided to post instead.Royse777 said earlier that he has too many DMs and sometimes he needs more time to respond, maybe it is more direct and efficient to try to contact him via Telegram.Here is a link: https://t.me/Royse777

comments.author: thepeterson
comments.body: Quote from: Little Mouse on July 03, 2023, 01:20:55 AMFeel free to DM me.Thank you it is a very interesting one

comments.author: thepeterson
comments.body: Quote from: PX-Z on July 02, 2023, 10:59:09 PMI remember some thread like this asking before, but sadly there is no campaign manager as of the moment accept such as referral program as per my knowledge (i hope there is). Maybe because they are so confident of their network where their previous participants always recommends them to those company's representative/owner that are asking.The project's I get doesn't even know what is bitcointalk or never cared about it

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Quote from: thepeterson on July 03, 2023, 06:45:23 AMThe project's I get doesn't even know what is bitcointalk or never cared about itJust a little explanation to them will give them insights what this forum is, especially if they target crypto users on their platform. Either it's a wallet service, mixer, exchange or a casino. Now if they target more on social media users, people who uses search engines, other crypto site's users then making google ads, facebook ads and other crypto-related ad network should be fine. But if they want to maximize their marketing budget and target then having a signature campaign on this forum is recommended.Oh, so there's a campaign manager who accepts such offer, good one.

comments.author: thepeterson
comments.body: Quote from: PX-Z on July 03, 2023, 08:12:18 AMQuote from: thepeterson on July 03, 2023, 06:45:23 AMThe project's I get doesn't even know what is bitcointalk or never cared about itJust a little explanation to them will give them insights what this forum is, especially if they target crypto users on their platform. Either it's a wallet service, mixer, exchange or a casino. Now if they target more on social media users, people who uses search engines, other crypto site's users then making google ads, facebook ads and other crypto-related ad network should be fine. But if they want to maximize their marketing budget and target then having a signature campaign on this forum is recommended.Oh, so there's a campaign manager who accepts such offer, good one.Most probably will be tokens not services but let's see

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: thepeterson on July 03, 2023, 06:45:23 AMQuote from: PX-Z on July 02, 2023, 10:59:09 PMI remember some thread like this asking before, but sadly there is no campaign manager as of the moment accept such as referral program as per my knowledge (i hope there is). Maybe because they are so confident of their network where their previous participants always recommends them to those company's representative/owner that are asking.The project's I get doesn't even know what is bitcointalk or never cared about itAre they Cryptocurrency related projects when it comes to discussion about Bitcoin, Bitcointalk always comes out as the number one platform, and if they know Nakamoto they know what other projects and platforms Nakamoto launched, but I am also aware that there are companies that are not aware of Bitcointalk and they are losing in terms of promotions and backlinks.

comments.author: bhadz
comments.body: Since you're alread aware that Royse has that program if you ever refer a campaign to him. Check the other management campaign thread's of other managers and read if they've got the same program.* Overview of Bitcointalk Signature Anti-Spam Campaign Managers* Campaign Management Services

comments.author: thepeterson
comments.body: Quote from: bhadz on July 03, 2023, 11:08:38 AMSince you're alread aware that Royse has that program if you ever refer a campaign to him. Check the other management campaign thread's of other managers and read if they've got the same program.* Overview of Bitcointalk Signature Anti-Spam Campaign Managers* Campaign Management ServicesLittle mouse gave me a really good offer, but I will look for others too, thanks

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Quote from: thepeterson on July 03, 2023, 11:11:41 AMQuote from: bhadz on July 03, 2023, 11:08:38 AMSince you're alread aware that Royse has that program if you ever refer a campaign to him. Check the other management campaign thread's of other managers and read if they've got the same program.* Overview of Bitcointalk Signature Anti-Spam Campaign Managers* Campaign Management ServicesLittle mouse gave me a really good offer, but I will look for others too, thanks I would possibly be interested in signature campaign clients that pay in bitcoin and be open to discussing a 1 time fee if the company shows you referred them, but I would not be interested in any bounty clients who pay in tokens.Managers are not really paid a ton of money, especially if doing a bounty campaign. Companies want to pay pennies and half the time offer tokens. I understand it looks like you're going ot help whomever offers the most money and that's fine, but if you already got a good offer it might be best to proceed with that manager.

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: thepeterson on July 03, 2023, 11:11:41 AMQuote from: bhadz on July 03, 2023, 11:08:38 AMSince you're alread aware that Royse has that program if you ever refer a campaign to him. Check the other management campaign thread's of other managers and read if they've got the same program.* Overview of Bitcointalk Signature Anti-Spam Campaign Managers* Campaign Management ServicesLittle mouse gave me a really good offer, but I will look for others too, thanks You should check every bounty managers thread and find a way to contact them by asking permission to pm them about your intention, I agree with PX-Z that your PM should specific and not mass send,you can ask permission to use their thread to refer new projects, the bounty managers can also give you tips apart from what you have, we have a lot of good bounty managers who have handled a lot of great projects, go for established managers, Little mouse, Royse777, Hhampuz CryptopreneurBrainboss and Yahoo are the best managers that you can work with, so good luck, it's a win situation for all of us here in Bitcointalk.

comments.author: thepeterson
comments.body: Yeah - also the project's I have contact with are well stabilized, verified, no shit.. they mainly don't just focus on en audience so it is a unique potential to grab em here.. let's see what's gonna happen

comments.author: AB de Royse777
comments.body: Quote from: thepeterson on July 03, 2023, 11:50:24 AMYeah - also the project's I have contact with are well stabilized, verified, no shit.. they mainly don't just focus on en audience so it is a unique potential to grab em here.. let's see what's gonna happen Sorry for my late entry. Feel free to contact me on my Telegram or via PM. Let's have a discussion which will benefit both of us.Cheers,

comments.author: Upgrade00
comments.body: I'm interested.You can contact me on telegram or drop a dm here on the forum.
